content.sourceTitle: Actress Sigourney Weaver Criticizes President Obama.
content.text: But that doesn't mean that Obama is beyond her criticism. In her role as an environmentalist, she spoke out against the Obama administration's off-shore drilling plan only months before the Deepwater Horizon oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico.
